entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
